title: Blended Learning Design for Workplace Learning and Job Performance Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Learning Motivation and Fundamental Job Concepts
context.additional_context: Systematic design required that combines theoretical learning with practical case analysis

learning_goals: Participants can explain the correlation between learning motivation and the workplace learning environment.
Participants can propose three or more strategies that contribute to improving job performance in a blended learning environment.
Participants can apply a framework for designing workplace learning programs from an HR perspective.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
